mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.group_name, g.group_description, g.group_aim, g.created_date, g.is_recruit, g.is_completed from group_table g inner join belong_table b on g.group_id = b.group_id inner join user_table u on b.user_id = u.user_id where b.user_id = #{userId} order by u.user_id

select * from group_table
and group_name like concat('%',#{groupName},'%')
and group_aim like concat('%',#{groupAim},'%')
and is_recruit like concat('%',#{isRecruit},'%')
and is_completed like concat('%',#{isCompleted},'%')
